chapters.title: Chapter 23:  Call to a Sitting
chapters.info:
Eben Hopwil,
      p. 494â€”One of the
      Asha'man.  He was about sixteen years old, and skinny.  He had a big
      nose and ears to match.  He died at the hands of
      Aran'gar during the cleansing of saidin
      near Shadar Logoth.
      See also
      Moseneillin, Daigian.
